title: Jokes aside, what are you supposed to do against Fiora?
body:
Early game: lane bully
Mid game: skirmishes master
Late game: one shots everybody

Has more HP than our Sion and deals more damage than Vayne.

This argument is really bad. Reactive spells like Counterstrike, Spellshield and Parry ARE NOT GOING TO BE USED EVER! before you use your most effective ability. Thus, it is impossible to bait them out. Aka, if you are playing Blitz against Sivir and she uses E before you use your hook, you are playing against idiots. If you are playing Jax against Fiora and she is using Parry before you try to stun, you are playing against idiots. If you are playing Bard against Morgana and she uses Black Shield before you try to stun her, you are playing against idiots. Counterplay tips are invalid if they only work on idiots.

Hook has a Travel time. It's easy to counter with Morg Black Shield/Sivir Shield.  Fiora's parry is also the only EARLY game waveclearing tool that she has, and I've seen plenty of Fioras blow it on that, or even on blocking a non CC ability.

See, they're always on edge, waiting to use it at the right moment, right?

So you call their bluff.  You act like you're about to drop the CC hammer on them by getting REALLY aggressive, then...when they've used Parry.


You use the actual CC

How is parry, a delayed single-target, non-scaling ability which Fiora maxes last a waveclear tool? Using your autoattacks is more effective.

And again, good players are going to see through your bluff. Most of CC you'll encounter are not instant; they have a missile or an obvious cast animation. Smart Fiora will not waste her Parry - she'll wait for said missile/animation to fly out and then use it.

Lose.  She's another failed Riot rework where they gave hyperscaling and 0 counterplay to a top lane champ that isn't weak early game.  So you just end up with another Riven, where she's one of the best smurf champs to climb with cause of how impossible it is to comeback on a fed one.

Play around the vitals in lane. Don't let her get to it. If its facing her, walk away and come back. 

Don't try soloing her. She is "the grand duelist" ffs. Her kit is designed for 1v1. 

If Sion has less max hp than her by mid game, fiora ain't the issue. Sion is.

Just pick something that can out bully her in lane. Riven, renekton, something like that. Poppy is also pretty good against her as well. She's a bit of a skill matchup a lot of the time since it's kind of a mind game to bait out her parry, but once you do you can go all in if she isn't fed. Lategame, bait out her parry with a low cd cc ability in a teamfight, then lock her down and blow her up. If she's going tanky, let your adc shred through her. She's essentially like a more mobile darius rn. Lots of damage, and relatively tanky. As long as she isn't fed you'll be fine. Champs with slows are also very effective against her, since her riposte is only really effective when used against stuns, and hard slows seriously inhibit her ability to move around and proc vitals in skirmishes and teamfights.

I wrote another post about countering her somewhere, but can't find it.

General counter tips:
1) You can reset her vitals by walking out of range. However, she can do this too.

2) She is rather squishy early and has low HP/5 due to her passive. Take someone strong early and punish her trying to trade.

3) Her parry has a high cooldown, try and fight her anytime it's down.

4) QSS removes her ultimate completely.

5) Attack speed slows like Nasus wither or Frozen Heart make it harder for her to proc her passive quicky.

6) She's melee. Take a ranged top and poke like no tomorrow. (Teemo especially will destroy her with his blind)

7) Her Q refunds CD when it hits a target and has a high cool down if she misses, punish her then.

A big tip for Riven vs Fiora:
DO NOT use 3rd Q on her if she has parry up as it will mean a free stun otherwise.

The problem with that is she can dash to you. So walking away doesn't work 99% of the time.

> 2) She is rather squishy early and has low HP/5 due to her passive. Take someone strong early and punish her trying to trade.

Yes, that is the only option. However, the strong early champs get outscaled by her, so there is definitely a timer on the window to win.

> 3) Her parry has a high cooldown, try and fight her anytime it's down.

Any decent Fiora won't fight you when it's down. Sad but true.

> 4) QSS removes her ultimate completely.

The problem is that she usually attacks someone without the QSS in teamfights. 

> 5) Attack speed slows like Nasus wither or Frozen Heart make it harder for her to proc her passive quicky.

More good advice. 

> 6) She's melee. Take a ranged top and poke like no tomorrow. (Teemo especially will destroy her with his blind)

Probably the best advice. Unfortunately Teemo gets outscaled by her, but at least you can set her back enough to have a chance.

> 7) Her Q refunds CD when it hits a target and has a high cool down if she misses, punish her then.
